entry.title: Glimpse of Us
entry.summary:
Author: stxrbabie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,875Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 2

Summary: Derek Hale doesn‚Äôt do feelings. He does distance. He does silence. And he does a hell of a lot of watching Stiles Stilinski from the treeline outside his window. Jealous of every laugh Stiles gives someone else, protective to the point of obsession, Derek tells himself it‚Äôs just pack. Just duty. Until the nights get too long and the pull gets too strong, and he starts slipping through Stiles‚Äô bedroom window like a shadow that doesn‚Äôt know how to stay away. Stiles, all soft edges and relentless kindness, keeps reaching anyway.

entry.title: Bloody Valentine
entry.summary:
Author: meowwers

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 906Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: Stiles moves to grab his keys from their holder, double checking if he has his phone and everything else on him before opening the front door. Before he could get his foot out, he's confronted with a gruesome, terrifying, and bloody scene right in front of him. The porch is decorated in a red liquid, crimson splashed all across their stairs and flooring, but what Stiles can't keep his eyes away from is the dead man in the center of it all.

entry.title: Twice And For All - Rewritten
entry.summary:
Author: novasillies

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 136,802Chapters: 22/66Kudos: 1

Summary: ‚ÄúW‚Äôs‚Ä¶ What‚Ä¶‚Äù Stiles‚Äô voice slurred, ‚ÄúDad‚Äì ‚Ä¶ forgot-me.‚Äù His head slammed back down into the carpet. Noah stared down at him like he‚Äôd failed as a parent, ‚ÄúGet the hell up, kid. You‚Äôve got school. Against your most hopeful belief, summer didn‚Äôt last forever.‚Äù Stiles felt sick. He couldn‚Äôt do this shit. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre a Sophomore, now, kid,‚Äù the Sheriff said, a little louder, nudging Stiles with his foot, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt make me regret teaching you to drive. I‚Äôm not helping you get to school anymore. It‚Äôs time to grow up.‚Äù His voice was fading, his footsteps creaking away, and Stiles just huffed as he muttered into the dust floating past him, little sunbeams shooting past his head, ‚ÄúI did the growing up already.‚Äù ‚ÄúAnd stop wasting my printer ink!‚Äù Noah called out as he left, ‚ÄúThat crap isn‚Äôt cheap!‚Äù - Stiles' spark fucks with the magic of the Ghost Riders and catapults him back to the day Scott got bit. Stranded in the past, the only way to ease his endless guilt is to try his damn best to fix it all. With... varying degrees of success. A rewrite of Twice And For All. it‚Äôll end the same, but we might get there a little differently. #growth (Can and should be read as a standalone/part 1)

entry.title: Same But Different
entry.summary:
Author: Reiko009

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,202Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 33

Summary: ‚ÄúLet me help, love.‚Äù Peter pulled away, which made Derek almost whimper at the loss of contact. The new pet name was only used when they were alone like this. Somehow the word was both too weak to describe what their coupling actually meant and a far more intimate endearment than what Derek felt that he deserved. What they were doing wasn‚Äôt love so much as need ‚Äì just with some added feelings bleeding through. He could sense his wolf curling protectively around what belonged to him, what anchored him, and what strengthened him as the Alpha. True, his pack was small: just him and Peter. But that was enough ‚Äì for now. A spicey reimagining of Season 2 where sex is the answer to Peter finding forgiveness and to keeping Derek sane as a new Alpha. Old foes and a new threat emerge, all while the Hale wolves begin to fall for a very human high schooler with deep brown eyes and a loud mouth. Expect a lot of familiar plot points from the canon, just with a twist. Mostly an excuse to write uncle/nephew werewolf smut.

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,658Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 136

Summary: ‚ÄúWell,‚Äù Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, ‚Äúat least this time he didn‚Äôt almost get us all killed.‚ÄùDerek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. ‚ÄúI was drunk.‚Äù They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It‚Äôs steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. ‚ÄúYou were careless,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúYou are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.‚Äù --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once, from a woman who wore it like skin. Now hemlock blooms in his own hands, and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "

entry.title: The Home Left Behind
entry.summary:
Author: Fluer

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,623Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 33

Summary: It‚Äôs been five years since Stiles Stilinski walked away from the Hale pack, from Derek, leaving behind the chaos of Beacon Hills to build a new life far from the dangers he once faced. He hasn‚Äôt spoken to Derek or any of the pack since. But when a powerful new enemy surfaces in Beacon Hills, threatening the safety of both humans and werewolves alike, Stiles has no choice but to return home. Now, with the fate of Beacon Hills hanging in the balance, Stiles must navigate rekindled emotions, rebuild strained relationships, and face his past head-on. But as the new threat grows stronger, Stiles and Derek are forced to work together once again, rediscovering their connection and confronting what they really mean to each other.

entry.title: Good Men Die Too
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,187Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 31

Summary: Stiles has never liked bad boys.Well, he's never liked boys, period. Lydia Martin used to have his heart... but that was long before Derek Hale, son of a dangerous criminal, rolled back into Beacon Hills. Why is he back? Why is he following in his fathers footsteps?And why can't Stiles just... let him go?

entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 163,034Chapters: 28/40Kudos: 158

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn‚Äôt hate the cage that once held him.They‚Äôd build a stronger one.
